ygData.subject: Dying in bad places (was:Re: Lute of the Gypsy Princess and other lutes.)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I have lost count of the number of times I have had to do this deep in a dungeon, all the casters have gated, all alone with half a dozen nasties pounding
ygData.messageBody:
>From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>
>
> In the current situation, deep in the castle, running was
> a bad idea, so I found my little corner and waited for the
> last starfire to hit. One death is worth the lute to me.
> Plus we got a variety of other trinkets, AND I got a cute
> screenshot of me as a dead wolf.
>
> Harmonic.

I have lost count of the number of times I have had to do this deep in a
dungeon, all the casters have gated, all alone with half a dozen nasties
pounding on and no chance of escape. Congrats on getting the lute (both of
them).




Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server

EQ Bard Song Analysis
http://rgonzalez.net/EQSongs/
